Package net.sf.lipermi.handler

Interface Summary
IConnectionHandlerListener This listener can be used to monitor a ConnectionHandler.
 

Class Summary
CallHandler A handler who know a RemoteInstance and its local implementations.
CallLookup A common static way to access the Socket which started the Delegator Thread.
CallProxy A dynamic proxy which delegates interface calls to a ConnectionHandler
ConnectionHandler A ConnectionHandler is object which can call remote methods, receive remote calls and dispatch its returns.
